type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ear.descriptor.DeploymentDescriptor
type.description: A deployment descriptor such as application.xml.

method.name: getApplicationName
method.description: The application name. Optional. Only valid with version 6.

method.name: getDescription
method.description: The application description. Optional.

method.name: getDisplayName
method.description: The application display name. Optional.

method.name: getFileName
method.description: The name of the descriptor file, typically "application.xml"

method.name: getInitializeInOrder
method.description: Whether to initialize modules in the order they appear in the descriptor, with the exception of client modules. Optional. Only valid with version 6.

method.name: getLibraryDirectory
method.description: The name of the directory to look for libraries in. Optional. If not specified then "lib" is assumed. Typically this should be set via org.gradle.plugins.ear.EarPluginConvention#setLibDirName(String) instead of this property.

method.name: getModuleTypeMappings
method.description: Mapping of module paths to module types. Non-null by default. For example, to specify that a module is a java module, set moduleTypeMappings["myJavaModule.jar"] = "java".

method.name: getModules
method.description: List of module descriptors. Must not be empty. Non-null and order-maintaining by default. Must maintain order if initializeInOrder is true.

method.name: getSecurityRoles
method.description: List of security roles. Optional. Non-null and order-maintaining by default.

method.name: getVersion
method.description: The version of application.xml. Required. Valid versions are "1.3", "1.4", "5" and "6". Defaults to "6".

method.name: module
method.description:
Add a module to the deployment descriptor.
param:path The path of the module to add.
param:type The type of the module, such as "ejb", "java", etc.

returns:this.

method.name: module
method.description:
Add a module to the deployment descriptor.
param:module The module to add.
param:type The type of the module, such as "ejb", "java", etc.

returns:this.

method.name: readFrom
method.description:
Reads the deployment descriptor from a reader.
param:reader The reader to read the deployment descriptor from

returns:this

method.name: readFrom
method.description:
Reads the deployment descriptor from a file. The paths are resolved as defined by org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)
param:path The path of the file to read the deployment descriptor from

returns:whether the descriptor could be read from the given path

method.name: securityRole
method.description:
Add a security role to the deployment descriptor.
param:role The name of the security role to add.

returns:this.

method.name: securityRole
method.description:
Add a security role to the deployment descriptor after configuring it with the given action.
param:action an action to configure the security role

returns:this.

method.name: securityRole
method.description:
Add a security role to the deployment descriptor.
param:role The security role to add.

returns:this.

method.name: webModule
method.description:
Add a web module to the deployment descriptor.
param:path The path of the module to add.
param:contextRoot The context root type of the web module.

returns:this.

method.name: withXml
method.description:
Adds a closure to be called when the XML document has been created. The XML is passed to the closure as a parameter in form of a groovy.util.Node. The closure can modify the XML before it is written to the output file. This allows additional JavaEE version 6 elements like "data-source" or "resource-ref" to be included.
param:closure The closure to execute when the XML has been created

returns:this

method.name: withXml
method.description:
Adds an action to be called when the XML document has been created. The XML is passed to the action as a parameter in form of a groovy.util.Node. The action can modify the XML before it is written to the output file. This allows additional JavaEE version 6 elements like "data-source" or "resource-ref" to be included.
param:action The action to execute when the XML has been created

returns:this

method.name: writeTo
method.description:
Writes the deployment descriptor into a writer.
param:writer The writer to write the deployment descriptor to

returns:this

method.name: writeTo
method.description:
Writes the deployment descriptor into a file. The paths are resolved as defined by org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)
param:path The path of the file to write the deployment descriptor into.

returns:this

property.name: applicationName
property.description: The application name. Optional. Only valid with version 6.

property.name: fileName
property.description: The name of the descriptor file, typically "application.xml"

property.name: initializeInOrder
property.description: Whether to initialize modules in the order they appear in the descriptor, with the exception of client modules. Optional. Only valid with version 6.

property.name: libraryDirectory
property.description: The name of the directory to look for libraries in. Optional. If not specified then "lib" is assumed. Typically this should be set via org.gradle.plugins.ear.EarPluginConvention#setLibDirName(String) instead of this property.

property.name: moduleTypeMappings
property.description: Mapping of module paths to module types. Non-null by default. For example, to specify that a module is a java module, set moduleTypeMappings["myJavaModule.jar"] = "java".

property.name: modules
property.description: List of module descriptors. Must not be empty. Non-null and order-maintaining by default. Must maintain order if initializeInOrder is true.

property.name: securityRoles
property.description: List of security roles. Optional. Non-null and order-maintaining by default.

property.name: version
property.description: The version of application.xml. Required. Valid versions are "1.3", "1.4", "5" and "6". Defaults to "6".
